description:
The meat room is cold, wet and it stinks. One can almost smell the stench of a hundred years of slaughtered animals in this place, and it is here we decide to test our prey.
This slut is a tough little number. It takes two of us to take her down in the hallway of the Armory, drag her into the slave quarters, and tie up, hood and molest her cunt, tits and mouth.
Once we exhaust and bind her, we drag her limp body to the basement and hang her on a meat hook to simmer for a while. We'll be back to hose her off, cut her down and feed her cock like the hungry little slave girl she is.
title: The Training of Dia Zerva, Day Three
